0.name: Percipience, Silent Dawn
0.fullDesc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy, with a <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> <u>base chance</u> of inflicting 1 stack of <u>Arcana</u> on the target. Additionally, when attacking a target that suffers Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, there is respectively a <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> <u>base chance</u> of inflicting 1 extra stack of <u>Arcana</u> on the target.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy and has a chance of applying <u>Arcana</u> to the target. After attacking a target that suffers <orangeStrong>Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock</orangeStrong>, there is respectively a chance of <orangeStrong>additionally applying <u>Arcana</u></orangeStrong>.

0.name: Decadence, False Twilight
0.fullDesc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy and any adjacent targets. At the same time, there is a {{2}}% <u>base chance</u> of inflicting 1 stack of <u>Arcana</u> on the target enemy and the adjacent targets. Additionally, there is a {{3}}% <u>base chance</u> of reducing the DEF of the target enemy and the adjacent targets by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{5}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy target and any adjacent targets, with a high chance of <orangeStrong>inflicting <u>Arcana</u></orangeStrong> on the targets and lowering their DEF.

0.name: Bliss of Otherworld's Embrace
0.fullDesc: Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies for {{2}} turn(s).\nWhile afflicted with Epiphany, enemies take <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> increased DMG in their turn. Additionally, if enemies are also inflicted with <u>Arcana</u>, they are considered to be simultaneously afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock. After <u>Arcana</u> causes DMG at the start of each turn, its stacks are not reset. This non-reset effect of <u>Arcana</u> stacks can be triggered up to {{4}} time(s) for the duration of Epiphany. And the trigger count resets when Epiphany is applied again.\nDeals Wind DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Black Swan's ATK to all enemies.
0.shortDesc: Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies, increasing the DMG the targets take in their turn. Additionally, <orangeStrong>having <u>Arcana</u> is regarded as having Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock</orangeStrong>. Furthermore, <u>Arcana</u> will not reset its stacks after causing DMG at the start of the next turn. Deals Wind DMG to all enemies.

0.name: From Façade to Vérité
0.fullDesc: After this Technique is used, there is a {{1}}% <u>base chance</u> for each enemy to be inflicted with 1 stack of <u>Arcana</u> at the start of the next battle. For each successful application of <u>Arcana</u> on a target, inflicts another stack of <u>Arcana</u> on the same target. This process repeats until <u>Arcana</u> fails to be inflicted on this target. For each successive application of <u>Arcana</u> on a target, its <u>base chance</u> of success is equal to {{2}}% of the <u>base chance</u> of the previous successful infliction of <u>Arcana</u> on that target.
0.shortDesc: After this Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, there is a high chance for each enemy to be <orangeStrong>inflicted with Arcana repeatedly until <u>Arcana</u> fails to be inflicted</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

1.name: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
1.desc: While Black Swan is active in battle, enemies afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock will have their corresponding Wind, Physical, Fire, or Lightning RES respectively reduced by {{1}}%.

2.name: Weep Not For Me, My Lamb
2.desc: When an enemy target afflicted with Arcana is defeated, there is a {{1}}% base chance of inflicting {{2}} stack(s) of Arcana on adjacent targets.

3.name: As Above, So Below
3.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

4.name: In Tears We Gift
4.desc: While in the Epiphany state, enemy targets have their Effect RES reduced by {{1}}% and Black Swan regenerates {{2}} Energy at the start of these targets' turns or when they are defeated. This Energy Regeneration effect can only trigger up to 1 time while Epiphany lasts. The trigger count is reset when Epiphany is applied again.

5.name: Linnutee Flyway
5.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Pantheon Merciful, Masses Pitiful
6.desc: When an enemy target gets attacked by Black Swan's allies, Black Swan has a {{2}}% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target.\nEvery time Black Swan inflicts Arcana on an enemy target, there is a {{1}}% fixed chance to additionally increase the number of Arcana stacked this time by {{3}}.
